AniWhere
I have read and agree to Privacy Policy and Tracking Policy. Our terms & conditions apply. Terms and Conditions By using the Aniwhere app, you agree to these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree, please do not use the app. We may modify these terms at any time. Continued use of the app after changes indicates your acceptance. You may need to create an account to access certain features. You are responsible for keeping your account information secure. You agree to use the app lawfully and not to post false information, harass others, or upload harmful content. All content in the app is owned by Aniwhere or its providers. Users retain ownership of their submitted content but grant Aniwhere a license to use it. Aniwhere allows users to report lost and found pets, but we are not responsible for the accuracy of user-provided information. Donations made through the app are voluntary. Aniwhere is not liable for the performance of listed charities. Aniwhere connects users with adoption organizations but does not guarantee the availability or suitability of pets or organizations. Aniwhere is not liable for any indirect or consequential damages arising from your use of the app. You agree to indemnify Aniwhere from any claims or damages arising from your use of the app. By using the app, you acknowledge that you have read and agree to these Terms and Condition
Welcome to the Aniwhere Help Center! Here you can find answers to common questions and guidance on how to use our app\'s features effectively. How can I report a lost pet? How can I report a found pet? How can I donate to a charity? How can I adopt a pet? I can\'t log in to my account. How do I do this? The app is not working properly
Feedback Welcome to the Aniwhere Feedback Center! Your feedback is valuable to us as it helps us improve and serve you and the animals better. Below you’ll find ways to provide feedback and suggestions. RATE YOUR EXPERIENCE Are you satisfied with our app? How can we improve it? Overall Service User Experience Feedback Process Navigation Efficiency App Reliability Tell us how can we improve..." SUBMIT
If you’re having trouble reporting your lost pet on our app, we recommend trying these solutions. Troubleshooting tips Update your Aniwhere app to the latest version. Connect to a reliable Wi-Fi network Make sure your device has enough storage Close your Aniwhere app and restart your device Instructions To Report First, go to the lost and found page Then click the circle red button It will bring you to the report page Fill up the information needed Click the report button
How can I report a found pet? If you’re having trouble Finding a lost pet in our app , we recommend trying these solutions. Instructions To Report First, Check your notifications if you have a notification about a pet that was found Or go to the main page and click the lost and found category at the main page Check the found pets page and check if your pet is there.
How can I report a found pet? If you’re having trouble Finding a lost pet in our app , we recommend trying these solutions. Instructions To Report First, Go to the main page and click the charities category You can see the post of the owners in need of donation of their pets Click the paw button and it will bring you to the donation page Click the donate button
How do I adopt a pet? If you’re having trouble about donating in our app , we recommend trying these solutions. First, Go to the main page and click the Adopt category You can see the post of the owners who opens their pet for donation Click the paw button and it will bring you to the donation page Click the donate button
I can\'t log in to my account. What should I do? If you’re having trouble about logging in your account , we recommend trying these solutions. Check Your Credentials Double-check that you’ve entered the correct email/username and password. Make sure caps lock isn’t on and there are no extra spaces. Reset Your Password If you’ve forgotten your password, click the "Forgot Password" link on the login page. Enter your registered email address, and we’ll send you a link to reset your password. Follow the instructions in the email to create a new password. Verify Your Email Ensure that your email address is verified. Check your inbox (and spam/junk folder) for any verification emails from Aniwhere. Check Your Internet Connection Make sure you have a stable internet connection. Try switching between Wi-Fi and mobile data to see if the issue resolves. Update the App Ensure you are using the latest version of Aniwhere. Visit your device\'s app store to check for updates. Clear Cache and Data If you’re still having trouble, try clearing the app’s cache and data in your device settings (for Android users), or uninstall and reinstall the app.
The app is not working properly If you’re having trouble about logging in your account, we recommend trying these solutions. Aniwhere App Not Working? Try These Steps: Restart the App Close the app completely and reopen it. Sometimes restarting the app can fix minor glitches. Clear Cache (Android Users) Go to your device’s settings, find "Apps," select Aniwhere, and clear the cache. This can resolve performance issues. Restart Your Device Sometimes a quick device reboot can help fix app performance issues. Reinstall the App Uninstall Aniwhere and reinstall it from your app store. This can resolve problems caused by corrupted data or files. Check for Device Software Updates Ensure that your device’s operating system is up to date. Older software may cause compatibility issues with the app.
your pet\'s name
